item.title: 美国起诉 Lyft，称该公司夸大司机盈利前景
item.description: 美国政府周五提起诉讼，指控 Lyft 的广告存在欺骗性，误导了潜在的司机，让他们不知道为这家共享汽车公司工作能赚多少钱。【原文：The U.S. government on Friday filed a lawsuit accusing Lyft of deceptive advertising that misled prospective drivers about how much money they might earn working for the ride-sharing company.】

item.title: 尽管遭遇旱灾，巴拿马运河本财年净收入仍增至 34.5 亿美元
item.description: 巴拿马运河管理机构周五表示，尽管大旱导致通过该水道的船只数量减少，但巴拿马运河在截至 9 月的财政年度中的利润仍增长了 9.5%，达到 34.5 亿美元。【原文：The Panama Canal's profit increased 9.5% in the fiscal year ended in September to $3.45 billion despite a severe drought that reduced the number of vessels that passed through the waterway, its authority said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Blackstone 正洽谈以 35 亿美元从 EQT 收购美国输油管股权
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士周五表示，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone 正在就以约 35 亿美元收购 EQT Corp 拥有的州际天然气管道的少数股权进行深入谈判。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone is in advanced talks to acquire minority stakes in the interstate natural gas pipelines owned by EQT Corp for about $3.5 billion, people familiar with the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: Tether 首席执行官否认美国联邦调查员的调查
item.description: Tether 首席执行官保罗-阿德罗伊诺（Paolo Adroino）周五表示，在媒体报道联邦政府正在调查这家加密货币公司之后，"没有迹象表明 "该公司正在接受任何调查。【原文：Tether CEO Paolo Adroino said on Friday that there was "no indication" that the cryptocurrency firm was under any investigation after a media report that the federal government was probing the company.】

item.title: 银行高管称，欧元区政府不应干预银行整顿
item.description: 两位高级银行高管周五表示，欧盟各国政府应避免干预银行业整合，因为欧盟需要通过银行业整合来与其他主要经济体竞争。【原文：European Union governments should refrain from interfering with banking consolidation, which the bloc needs to compete with other major economies, two senior bank executives said on Friday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁格奥尔基耶娃认为存在财政风险，各国央行需谨慎降息
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周五表示，世界各国政府需要重建财政能力，各国央行应慎重考虑降息时机。【原文：Governments around the world need to rebuild fiscal capacity and central banks should think carefully about the timing of interest rate cuts, International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said on Friday.】

item.title: Meta Platforms 将在人工智能聊天机器人中使用路透社新闻内容
item.description: Meta Platforms 周五表示，其人工智能聊天机器人将使用路透社的内容实时回答用户有关新闻和时事的问题，这是大型科技公司与新闻出版商之间最新的人工智能合作。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Friday its artificial intelligence chatbot will use Reuters content to answer user questions in real time about news and current events, the latest AI tie-up between a big technology company and a news publisher.】

item.title: 蒂尔的 Palantir 公司因为以色列工作而被挪威投资者抛弃
item.description: 北欧地区最大的投资者之一已经出售了其在 Palantir Technologies 公司的持股，原因是担心这家美国数据公司为以色列所做的工作可能会使这家资产管理公司面临违反国际人道法和人权的风险。【原文：One of the Nordic region's largest investors has sold its holdings in Palantir Technologies because of concerns that the U.S. data firm's work for Israel might put the asset manager at risk of violating international humanitarian law and human rights.】

item.title: 德国财长：美国和欧盟的贸易战只会带来输家
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）在接受路透社采访时说，美国和欧盟之间的贸易冲突不会有赢家，只会有输家。【原文：A trade conflict between the United States and the European Union would not see any winner but only losers, German Finance Minister Christian Lindner told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，波音公司正在探索出售其太空业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，波音公司正在探索出售其太空业务。【原文：Boeing is exploring the sale of its space business, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Septerna 首次登陆纳斯达克，股价上涨近 31%，估值达 9.7 亿美元
item.description: Septerna 公司的股票在周五首次上市时上涨了约 31%，为这家由高盛支持的生物技术公司带来了 9.7 亿美元的估值。【原文：Septerna's shares rose about 31% in their market debut on Friday, giving the Goldman Sachs-backed biotech firm a valuation of $970 million.】

item.title: 意大利埃尼公司预计 2025 年出售资产净收益达 25 亿欧元
item.description: 意大利能源集团埃尼（Eni）首席财务官弗朗西斯科-加泰伊（Francesco Gattei）周五表示，预计明年完成的额外处置将带来 25 亿欧元（合 27 亿美元）的净收益。【原文：Italian energy group Eni expects 2.5 billion euros ($2.7 billion) in net proceeds from additional disposals that will be completed next year, Chief Transition & Financial Officer Francesco Gattei said on Friday.】

item.title: 波音公司工人罢工可能拖累美国10月份薪资水平
item.description: 周五的政府数据显示，波音工厂工人的罢工可能会使 10 月份美国非农就业岗位减少约 3.3 万个。【原文：A strike by Boeing factory workers could subtract about 33,000 jobs from U.S. nonfarm payrolls in October, government data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 英伟达超越苹果成为全球最有价值公司
item.description: 上周五，英伟达（Nvidia）的股价在对其新型超级计算人工智能芯片的巨大需求推动下创下历史新高，从而取代苹果公司成为全球最有价值的公司。【原文：Nvidia dethroned Apple as the world's most valuable company on Friday, following a record-setting rally in the stock powered by an insatiable demand for its new supercomputing AI chips.】

item.title: 中国市场疲软、电动车转型放缓影响利润，保时捷股份公司宣布削减成本
item.description: 豪华跑车制造商保时捷（Porsche AG）周五警告称，由于向电动汽车转型的速度低于预期，加上中国市场持续疲软，保时捷九个月的营业利润下降了四分之一以上，因此该公司可能会削减成本。【原文：Luxury sportscar maker Porsche AG on Friday warned it may cut costs after a slower-than-expected transition towards electric vehicles and persisting weakness in the Chinese market caused nine-month operating profit to fall by more than a quarter.】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 完成 56 亿美元融资，扩大自动驾驶打车服务
item.description: Alphabet 的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 周五表示，它已经完成了由谷歌母公司领投的一轮 56 亿美元的融资，希望借此扩大其自动驾驶乘车服务。【原文：Alphabet's self-driving unit, Waymo, said on Friday it had closed a $5.6 billion funding round led by the Google parent, as it looks to expand its autonomous ride-hailing service.】

item.title: 美国消费者情绪高涨，尤其是共和党人
item.description: 由于利率下降有助于改善汽车等大件商品的购买条件，美国消费者情绪在10月份攀升至六个月来的最高点，但这一上升在共和党人中最为明显，他们对自己的政党在11月5日的总统大选中重夺白宫信心倍增。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment climbed to a six-month high in October as declining interest rates helped improve buying conditions for big-ticket items like cars, but the uptick was most pronounced among Republicans who grew more confident in their party regaining the White House in the Nov. 5 presidential election.】

item.title: 中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 在纳斯达克首次上市时股价开盘持平
item.description: 中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 周五在纳斯达克首次上市时股价开盘持平。【原文：Chinese self-driving startup WeRide's shares opened flat in their Nasdaq debut on Friday.】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局称麦当劳大肠杆菌疫情导致 75 人患病
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周五表示，已有 75 人因麦当劳 Quarter Pounder 汉堡包引发的大肠杆菌疫情而受到感染。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said on Friday that 75 persons have been infected from the E.coli outbreak linked to McDonald's Quarter Pounder hamburgers.】

item.title: Stellantis 将于 2026 年开始在意大利梅尔菲工厂生产新款蓝旗亚 Gamma
item.description: Stellantis 周五表示，将于 2026 年在其位于意大利南部的梅尔菲（Melfi）工厂开始生产新款蓝旗亚 Gamma 中型轿车，这家法意汽车制造商希望新款车型将有助于其重新启动在意大利的生产。【原文：Stellantis said on Friday it would start production of a new Lancia Gamma mid-sized car in 2026 at its Melfi plant in southern Italy, as the Franco-Italian automaker hopes new models will help it relaunch its output in the country.】

item.title: 新墨西哥州研究石油钻探限制措施，产量和收入将受影响
item.description: 新墨西哥州是美国第二大产油州，该州首席经济学家本周在一份报告中称，该州正在研究新的钻井限制措施，这些措施将使该州未来原油产量的 5.4% 受到打击，并导致数十亿美元的收入损失。【原文：New Mexico, the second-largest oil-producing state in the U.S., is studying new restrictions on drilling that would hit up to 5.4% of its future crude output and result in billions of dollars in lost revenue, the state's chief economist said this week in a report.】

item.title: 美国核监管机构听取三哩岛核电站重启计划
item.description: 周五，美国核管理委员会就重启一座退役反应堆这一史无前例的项目举行了首次公开会议，Constellation 能源公司在会上提出了恢复其三里岛核电站运行许可证的理由。【原文：Constellation Energy is making its case to restore the operating license for its Three Mile Island nuclear power plant in the first public meeting before the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission on Friday on the unprecedented project to restart a retired reactor.】

item.title: 独家报道：法国达能集团在欧盟新规实施前淘汰巴西大豆
item.description: 法国乳业巨头达能公司的财务总监告诉路透社，在欧盟要求企业证明没有从毁林地采购大豆的规定出台之前，达能已经停止从巴西采购大豆，现在从亚洲国家采购。【原文：French dairy giant Danone has stopped sourcing soy from Brazil and now buys from countries in Asia, its finance chief told Reuters, ahead of a European Union rule requiring companies to prove they are not sourcing from deforested land.】

item.title: 前沿通信要求股东接受 Verizon 的收购要约
item.description: 前沿通信公司周五敦促股东投票支持威瑞森公司（Verizon）200 亿美元的收购要约，称该公司已审查了其他潜在买家的意向，发现该电信巨头的提议是最有利的选择。【原文：Frontier Communications urged shareholders on Friday to vote for a $20 billion takeover bid from Verizon , saying that it had reviewed interest from other potential buyers and found the telecom giant's proposal as the most favorable option.】

item.title: 中国恒大电动汽车部门停止讨论股权出售事宜
item.description: 中国恒大新能源汽车公司周五表示，其潜在卖家已决定停止出售该公司股份的谈判，该公司是负债累累的中国恒大集团旗下的电动汽车部门。【原文：China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle said on Friday that its potential sellers have decided to cease talks for a stake sale in the company, which is the electric vehicle unit of the debt-laden China Evergrande .】

item.title: 美国法官批准航运公司与司法部就巴尔的摩塌桥事件达成的 1.02 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 今年 3 月，一艘轮船撞击巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥，造成 6 人死亡，该轮船的所有者和运营公司达成了 1.02 亿美元的和解协议。【原文：A U.S. judge on Friday approved a $102 million settlement by the companies that owned and operated the ship that struck Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge in March, killing six people.】

item.title: 汽车经销商团体质疑 Scout Motors 直销美国消费者的决定
item.description: 代表美国汽车经销商的团体周五表示，他们计划对大众汽车旗下 Scout Motors 绕过独立零售商直接向消费者销售的决定提出质疑。【原文：Groups representing U.S. auto dealers said Friday they plan to challenge Volkswagen's Scout Motors decision to sell directly consumers, bypassing independent retailers.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 股票反弹面临科技财报、就业数据和大选的重重考验
item.description: 从下周开始，科技巨头将公布公司业绩，就业报告也将受到密切关注，同时美国大选也将临近。【原文：The rally in U.S. stocks is wobbling as it confronts a stretch of potentially market-shaking events, starting next week with corporate results from tech titans and the closely watched employment report, while the U.S. election is also nearing.】

item.title: 英特尔将投资 280 多亿美元在俄亥俄州建立两家芯片工厂
item.description: 英特尔公司周五表示，将投资 280 多亿美元在俄亥俄州利辛县新建两家芯片工厂，以推进其代工业务扩张计划。【原文：Intel said on Friday it would invest more than $28 billion to construct two new chip factories in Licking County, Ohio, as the company pushes ahead with plans to expand its foundry business.】

item.title: 加拿大 8 月零售销售因汽车销售增长 0.4%，大部分行业销售下降
item.description: 周五的数据显示，由于大部分行业的消费支出出现紧张，加拿大8月份的零售销售额略有增长，但不及预期。【原文：Canada's retail sales in August increased marginally and missed expectations as consumer spending showed strains across majority of sectors, data showed on Friday.】
